title: UCI Gravel World Championships Elite Men’s Start List + Riders to Watch
content:
Will Vermeersch repeat? Can Swenson beat Van Aert? What about Petr Vakoç? The elite men's event at gravel worlds is anybody's race.

Read the full article at UCI Gravel World Championships Elite Men’s Start List + Riders to Watch on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
